data.text: N xa bɛɛti ba n xanuntenyi bɛ,
A naxa bɔxi buxa, a gɛmɛe matongo, a sansi fanyie si a ma.
Darisalamukae nun Yudayakae, wo kiiti n tan nun n ma wɛni xɛ ma.
Munse man luxi, n mu naxan nabaxi n ma xɛ bɛ?
N xa a fala wo bɛ n naxan nabama n ma xɛ ra.
N a raboloma nɛ alako tunbe nun ɲooge xa bula sansi fanyi ɲɔxɔ ra.
Na wɛni xɛ misaalixi Alatala Sɛnbɛma xa ɲama Isirayila nan na,
Ɲaxankatɛ na mixie bɛ, naxee banxie tima e fari idɔxɔ,
Alatala Sɛnbɛma a masen nɛ n bɛ,
Wɛni xɛ xungbe, bogi dondoronti raminima nɛ.
Ɲaxankatɛ na mixie bɛ naxee kelima subaxɛ ma sigafe ra beere fende,
E kɔrae, maxasee, nun sarae raberema e xa xulunyie kui,
Na fahaamutareɲa nan a niyama e xa xanin konyiya kui ɲamanɛ ma.
Aligiyama naadɛ rabima nɛ e bɛ,
Adama xa fe xun nakanama nɛ,
Kɔnɔ Alatala Sɛnbɛma tantuma nɛ a xa tinxinyi xa fe ra.
Na tɛmui yɛxɛɛe e dɛ madonma nɛ na yire kanaxie ma alɔ e na e xɔnyi nɛ,
Ɲaxankatɛ na mixie bɛ, naxee yunubie bɛndunma e yɛtɛ ma wule ra,
Na mixie nu fa a fala e dɛ ra,
Ɲaxankatɛ na mixie bɛ, naxee fe ɲaaxi findima fe fanyi ra,
Ɲaxankatɛ na mixie bɛ, naxee e yɛtɛ maɲɔxunxi fe kolonyie ra,
Ɲaxankatɛ na mixie bɛ, naxee xili xungbe sɔtɔma beere minfe kui,
E nɔndi fi funmala ma kɔbiri xa fe ra,
Na mixie xa fe xun nakanama nɛ alɔ sɛxɛ xaraxi ganma ki naxɛ.
Na nan a ra Alatala bɔɲɛ texi a xa ɲama xili ma,
Alatala bara tɔnxuma masen ɲamanɛ ma,
Mixi taganxi yo mu na e ya ma,
Na mixie xa xalie ɲɔɛe raxaɲɛnxi,
E ɲarandan alɔ yɛtɛ naxan sube suxuma,
Na lɔxɔɛ e ɲarandanyi mɛma nɛ alɔ baa mɔrɔnyie,
